snippet: A new law, which takes effect in July, will allow students to pray over school intercoms, at assemblies and sporting events.
abstract: Mississippi law taking effect in July requires public schools to develop policies that will allow students to pray over school intercoms, at assemblies and at sporting events.
lead_paragraph: A new law, which takes effect in July, will allow students to pray over school intercoms, at assemblies and sporting events.

headline.seo: Mississippi Requires Public Schools to Develop Policies on Prayer
headline.main: Mississippi Tells Public Schools to Develop Policies Allowing Prayers
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Tells Public Schools to Develop Policies Allowing Prayers
